question.body: Which of the following is/are found in cell membranes? Select the single best option.

multiple_choice.choice: All of the above are associated with the membrane.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Although carbohydrates are found in the cell membrane, it is not the only item on this list that is found in membranes.
Incorrect. Although phospholipids are found in the cell membrane, it is not the only item on this list that is found in membranes.
Incorrect. Although proteins are found in the cell membrane, it is not the only item on this list that is found in membranes.
Incorrect. Although cholesterol is found in the cell membrane, it is not the only item on this list that is found in membranes.
Correct. Cell membranes contain carbohydrates, phospholipids, cholesterol and protein.
